channel.title: 🏢 Apollo Research on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Apollo Research on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Identifying Functionally Important Features with End-to-End Sparse Dictionary Learning
item.description: End-to-end sparse autoencoders revolutionize neural network interpretability by learning functionally important features, outperforming traditional methods in efficiency and accuracy.
